title: The earliest form of technology
content: Tolstoy's epic masterpiece intertwines the lives of private and public individuals during the time of the Napoleonic wars and the French invasion of Russia. The fortunes of the Rostovs and the Bolkonskys, of Pierre, Natasha, and Andrei, are intimately connected with the national history that is played out in parallel with their lives. Balls and soirees alternate with councils of war and the machinations of statesmen and generals, scenes of violent battles with everyday human passions in a work whose extraordinary imaginative power has never been surpassed.
author: Leo Tolstoy

title: Knowing about how technology has evolved desgin
content: creating the brilliant architeure that is available took years of study and designing and testing those ideas with different sources. over time things got better as well as how things were handled and the times passed and then technology came to the rescue of designers and builders as well as the various users.
author: Leo Tolstoy
